name: Viam in Tenebris
description:
In this game you have to complete 25 labyrinths - in the dark - equipped with only the smallest of light-source.

Find all the keys to unlock each exit.

Those lightning bolts provide some light from time to time. But are they doing something else? I could swear there was a path here before…

Use Arrow keys or WASD to move.

This game was a submission to Ludum Dare #51 and was created in around 27 hours.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/magical-labyrinth
